means: 不可更改地，不可挽回地，不可反转地

sentence.Network_en: Television has irreversibly changed our perception of the Royal Family.
sentence.Network_cn: 电视不可逆转地改变了我们对皇室的印象。

sentence.Network_en: Agriculture in the developing nations is not irreversibly committed , to a particular pattern of intensification.
sentence.Network_cn: 发展中国家的农业并没有完全为某种集约化形式所束缚.

sentence.Network_en: Even under this optimistic scenario, however, the world will have changed irreversibly.
sentence.Network_cn: 但即使在这种乐观情况下, 世界也将发生不可逆转的变化.

...irreversible 不能撤回的, 不能取消的, 不能还原的irreversibly 不能撤回地,不能取消地,不能还原地irrevocable 不能取消的, 不能唤回的

list.abs: 纤维用语中英文对照 - 豆丁网 ... 平纹 plain 单面绒布 Irreversible flannelette 斜纹 twill.
这类凝胶脱水干燥后,再放入水中,一般不能再生成原来的凝胶,更不会形成原来的溶胶。所以它又称为不可逆凝胶(irreversible gel)。 现代的溶胶-凝胶法制备超细粉体.
...（NaOH(aq)+ HCl(aq) –> NaCl(aq)+ H2O），在常温常压下只会向右进行，为『不可逆反应（irreversible reaction）』。然而有些反应：例如在一密闭系统中，水会蒸发形成水蒸气；水蒸气也能凝结形成水，其互变的程度则因温度.
irreversible conversion 不可逆转变irreversible cycle 不可逆循环irreversible engine 不可倒转发动机

entry.tran: 不可逆转的;不可挽回的;不可撤销的
entry.def: If a change is irreversible, things cannot be changed back to the way they were before.

example.ex: She could suffer irreversible brain damage if she is not treated within seven days...
example.tran: 如果她在 7 天之内没有得到治疗,她的大脑有可能遭受不可逆转的损伤。

auth_sentence.content: Two minutes later, several people's lives had changed irreversibly.
auth_sentence.res_content: Two minutes later, several people's lives had changed irreversibly.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Two minutes later, several people's lives had changed irreversibly.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Sajjad predicts the damage may have irreversibly hurt the next planting season.

auth_sentence.content: Gradually scarring or fibrosis develops, and the airways become irreversibly narrowed.
auth_sentence.res_content: Gradually scarring or fibrosis develops, and the airways become irreversibly narrowed.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Gradually scarring or fibrosis develops, and the airways become irreversibly narrowed.
